original_text: Moses had given no land to the tribe of Levi. This was because God had made the Levites a promise. He had made a rule that they would receive their food from the sacrifices and offerings that the other tribes gave to the Lord God of Israel. The Levites received that, instead of land for themselves.
korean_text: 오직 레위 지파에게는 여호수아가 기업으로 준 것이 없었으니 이는 그에게 말씀하신 것과 같이 이스라엘의 하나님 여호와께 드리는 화제물이 그들의 기업이 되었음이더라

sentences.original_text: Moses had given no land to the tribe of Levi
sentences.korean_translation: 모세는 레위 지파에게 땅을 주지 않았다

sentences.original_text: This was because God had made the Levites a promise
sentences.korean_translation: 이것은 하나님이 레위 사람들에게 약속을 하셨기 때문이었다

sentences.original_text: He had made a rule that they would receive their food
sentences.korean_translation: 그는 그들이 음식을 받을 것이라는 규칙을 만드셨다

sentences.original_text: that the other tribes gave to the Lord God of Israel
sentences.korean_translation: 다른 지파들이 이스라엘의 주 하나님께 드린
